cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value like -1 will cause thread configuration errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 0 will cause TDD configuration errors as at least one downlink slot is required.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 0 會導致 TDD 配置錯誤，因為至少需要一個下行鏈路時隙。
